```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| include: false

library(tidyverse) ; library(gt) ; library(gtExtras)
```

```{r}
read_csv("data.csv") |>
  arrange(desc(Reviewed)) |> 
  gt() |> 
  fmt_url(
    columns = TitleLink,
    label = fontawesome::fa(
      name = "link",
      height = "0.75em",
      vertical_align = "0em"
     ),
    color = "#bdbdbd"
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = AuthorLink,
    label = fontawesome::fa(
      name = "link",
      height = "0.75em",
      vertical_align = "0em"
     ),
    color = "#bdbdbd"
  ) |>
  cols_merge(
    columns = c(Title, TitleLink),
    pattern = "{1} {2}"
  ) |> 
  cols_merge(
    columns = c(Author, AuthorLink),
    pattern = "{1} {2}"
  ) |> 
  sub_missing(missing_text = "") |> 
  tab_header(
    title = md("***Book club reads***")
  ) |>
  opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> 
  tab_options(
    heading.title.font.size = px(30),
    heading.padding = px(0)
  ) |> 
  opt_interactive(
    use_compact_mode = TRUE,
    use_search = TRUE,
  ) |> 
  gt_theme_dot_matrix() 
```
